description.p: GeForce Infinity is a next-gen application designed to enhance the GeForce NOW experience. Originally created to address the lack of native GeForce NOW support on Linux, this app also provides functionality for Windows users. My goal is to refine the user interface and offer custom features for an improved experience.

Automute: mutes the game when the window is not in focus.

Anti-kick feature. Disclaimer: This is not a real anti-kick. It does not prevent kicks and may violate NVIDIA's TOS. It simply alt-tabs you back into the game if you're unfocused. (both autofocus and inactivity notifications must be enabled)

description.p: After a long time of abandoning this project I recently came back to it, thanks to the people who starred and forked my repo! I noticed a bit late but it gave me a huge motivation boost and now after some big changes I feel like version 1.0.0 is ready!
As it is 1.0.0 it will have bugs and is nowhere near finished, but it has its core functionalities working.
The .exe and .zip files are for Windows; the rest are for Linux.
